title: Ashes captains on Joe Root's role and the fifth and final Test – video
text: Ashes captains Joe Root and Tim Paine have spoken ahead of the fifth and final Ashes Test at the Oval. England have made two changes with Sam Curran and Chris Woakes replacing Jason Roy and Craig Overton. Root insisted there was plenty still for his side to play for. 'It’s bitterly disappointing not to have got the Ashes back, but we haven’t lost anything yet,' he said. 'We’ve got to make sure we square the series up'. Australia will be looking to seal the series with a win. 'This Test is bigger than the last one. This is our grand final.' said Paine
description: 'We haven't lost anything yet' said England captain Joe Root
